ResourceEnum.Name: RASReturnCodes
ResourceEnum.Resource: Error: Invalid rbridge-id specified, command failed
Error: Invalid severity level specified, command failed

Error: Invalid input - new name contains invalid characters or begins with a digit, command failed
Error: Invalid input - new name string contain blank space

Error: Cannot change severity of an auditlog message
Error: This is an internal RAS log and cannnot be blocked
